name: VIDEO: County Frontline Health Workers Begin Getting COVID-19  Vaccine
description: With new COVID-19 cases setting records, demand for the vaccine is high. This is especially true for the health care providers who battle the virus daily in critical care settings. These immunizations are the shot in the arm they’ve been waiting for.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: With new COVID-19 cases setting records, demand for the vaccine is high. This is especially true for the health care providers who battle the virus daily in critical care settings. These immunizations are the shot in the arm they’ve been waiting for.
